ygData.subject: Re: Attack on the Maximals
ygData.msgSnippet: Azureblade was entranced, but not oblivious. He could feel them. Two immense forms of energy rippling through the Matrix. These were going to be devastating.

Azureblade was entranced, but not oblivious. He could feel them. Two 
immense forms of energy rippling through the Matrix. These were 
going to be devastating.

AzureBlade: No Kup. This won't be like any battle. If we have to 
die... let's make them regret every millimeter in our sparks they 
kill!

He changed in dragon mode with a roar aqnd headed outside.

AzureBlade: Activate all the defenses you can! We have one chance to 
survive, so let's not blow it!

Rockseeker was closing in fast.

Rockseeker: This is it sister. Take care of the bugs, I destroy 
their hive.

He changed in meteor mode and picked up more and more speed. 
Ancient's daggers hit him and got stuck, but his rocky hide did not 
convey anything of it. He was heading straight at the base!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime/Darkangel : :
>  
> With the red alert lights flashing and blast shields moving in 
place over windows Rodimus' meeting with Darkangel is interupted.
>  
> Rodimus Prime: What now?!
>  
> Darkangel: It's begun, Prime. Make your decision quickly.
>  
> Rodimus Prime: Alright, alright, you got your alliance!
>  
> Darkangel: Then I will stay and fight alongside you Maximals. 
First I must contact Tyrael.
>  
> Rodimus Prime: How? Communications have been jammed.
>  
> Darkangel: I will reconfigure a sensor to send a coded message 
within a scan wave and beam it at the Tripredacus base. I'll need 
access to a computer terminal.
>  
> Rodimus points to the computer on his desk.
>  
> Rodimus Prime: Right there. Make it quick.
>  
> Darkangel slides over the desk, taking a seat. He starts typing 
away on the keyboard, reconfiguring the sensor array.
> 
>
